entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Drumheller
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Snow mixed with rain late this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming light this evening. Low zero. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
